title: Coal valley
creator_credit: Derek Wright, New Zealand National Film Unit and Conon Fraser
brief_description: Presents the case for small scale private mining by examining the independence, ingenuity and engineering skill of the men who built and work five small privately owned coal mines on the west coast of New Zealand’s South Island. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
